title: Premature End of Match [BUG???]
body:
I was just in a match that lasted less than 10 minutes. As Jhin ADC, my support Ali DC'd. Short after, both me and our Quinn (my friend) DC'd as well.
When I DC, I usually quit the match then rejoin to see if it helps. So I did that.

Instead of the button to rejoin the match, the whole client was available. As if the match was completely over.
Again, the match went on less than 10 minutes at this point. Everyone was in the match, so it definitely wasn't /remake. And far too soon for an early surrender.
My friend, our Quinn, said that his whole client was available after he DC'd as well.

I've never had this happen before. 
Any ideas?

replies.body: Ahhhh it sounds like that game must have crashed entirely for everyone in that game. It's pretty rare, but when it does happen everyone is booted from the game, they don't get any penalties for leaving, and everyone can requeue immediately after. No worries, you're free to start up another game if it happens again.

My friend and I did requeue immediately after. And we also noticed we didn't get any penalties for it. So we didn't worry all that much.

But knowing why it happened and what it was helps a lot! Thank you.
